name: Pongy Pong
description:
That's one of my first games made in Unity.  I think, that I don't need to explain to anyone how to play it. Basically, w/s or up/down to move left paddle and 8/6(in two players mode)

There I made a simple menu system with animations, settings, where you can set a match duration and score limit. Also, there you can hear music during gameplay, when you or enemy scores  and when the ball bounces off the wall or from paddle.
